languages.text: "Вместо того, чтобы помочь готовым оступиться, вы сеете смерть?"
"Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"
languages.original_text: "Вместо того, чтобы помочь готовым оступиться, вы сеете смерть?"

traits.locale_text: "You could have shown compassion to those in need and instead, you sow death?"
"You could have shown compassion to those in need and instead, you sow death?"
"Instead of showing compassion to those in need, you offer them... death?"
"Instead of showing compassion to those in need, you offer them... death?"
"Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"
"Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

languages.text: « Donc, plutôt que de venir en aide aux brebis égarées, vous leur offrez... la mort ? »
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

traits.locale_text: « Donc, plutôt que de venir en aide aux brebis égarées, vous leur offrez... la mort ? »

languages.text: «En lugar de ayudar a quienes pueden necesitarlo, les ofrecen... ¿la muerte?».
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

traits.locale_text: «En lugar de ayudar a quienes pueden necesitarlo, les ofrecen... ¿la muerte?».

languages.text: “你们不去帮助那些需要帮助的人，反而送他们……去死？”
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

traits.locale_text: “你们不去帮助那些需要帮助的人，反而送他们……去死？”

languages.text: 「困っている人たちに思いやりを示す代わりに、与えるのか…死を？」
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

traits.locale_text: 「困っている人たちに思いやりを示す代わりに、与えるのか…死を？」

languages.text: "Anstelle den Strauchelnden zu helfen, bietet Ihr ihnen ... den Tod?"
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"

traits.locale_text: "Anstelle den Strauchelnden zu helfen, bietet Ihr ihnen ... den Tod?"

languages.text: "Yoldan çıkmak üzere olanlara yardım etmek yerine onları... Öldürüyor musunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Instead of helping those who may soon stumble, you offer them... death?"
